name: Dungeon Break - 深淵英雄
description:
《Dungeon Break》A small villain may accomplish greatness, freedom is ours!

The minions live in dungeon are now tired of the lords, the humble servants are now rebelling!

【Dash! Shoot! Close Your Eyes!】
Dash yourself out of the Dungeons you once built, try to avoid all tricky sneaky traps you set!

【Challenge Literally YOUR BOSSES】
YOUR Superiors are angry! Breakthrough ice arrows and explosive barrels, defeat levels of levels!

【Super Cute, Super Dope】
Square skeletons and Doggy salamanders are at your side!

【Scavenge! Equip yourself!】
Laser, Shotgun, Cannons!
ATK, SPD, DEF, cultivate your minions and defeat generals!
